attributes.action: Install a pedestrian crossing on Kings Road, Horsham, West Sussex.
attributes.background: We are campaigning for a pedestrian crossing to be installed on Kings Road, Horsham, West Sussex. We feel that a crossing is urgently needed because the road is often congested, the traffic is horrendous and there is no where safe to cross. Please show your support and help us campaign for change.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Pedestrian crossings on local roads are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor
